name: Sewer Cheese
description:
At the heart of every rat lies the desire for cheese. Not just any cheese, sewer cheese. 

As a fellow rat, you are no different. You need that stinky, slimy, sometimes grimy sewer cheese, and you need it now. Where ever could those blocks of cheesy deliciousness be? In a pipe perhaps or... Wait, is that a faceless, arm-flailing monster!

Collect your six pieces of cheese, avoid the clumsy humans and remember to do so for the sake of the rat empire. Stay strong, furry friend.

************************** Sewer Cheese ************************

Game Objective: Collect 6 pieces of cheese

Controls: WASD to move

(Created for a 12-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Testing :: Adrian Fisher
